channel.title: Whonix 9.4 Maintenance Release
channel.description:
[html]

Download: http://mirror.whonix.de/9.4/

Upgrading: Existing users can upgrade the usual way using apt-get, see also: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Updates

Changelog between 9.3 and 9.4: – tb-updater: fixed remote download location to cope up with The Tor Project’s changes – https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/366 – build script: updated frozen repository – build script: use specific codename (wheezy) rather than generic code name (stable) as per “build script broken because of using grml-debootstrap with –release stable” – https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/368

[/html]

item.title: Whonix 9.4 Maintenance Release
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
[html]

Download:

http://mirror.whonix.de/9.4/

Upgrading:

Existing users can upgrade the usual way using apt-get, see also: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Updates

Changelog between 9.3 and 9.4:

– tb-updater: fixed remote download location to cope up with The Tor Project’s changes – https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/366

– build script: updated frozen repository

– build script: use specific codename (wheezy) rather than generic code name (stable) as per “build script broken because of using grml-debootstrap with –release stable” – https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/368


[/html]

Read full topic
